Pre-Game Insights: India has already qualified for the semi-finals and will top Group 2 if they beat Zimbabwe.
Zimbabwe might be all but out of the tournament following their defeat to Netherlands earlier in the group stage.
Others: This is the first time India and Zimbabwe are playing each other in a T20 World Cup.
Virat Kohli is 68 short of becoming the first batter to reach 4000 runs in T20Is.
Suryakumar Yadav (965) is 35 away from completing 1000 T20I runs in 2022.
Sikandar Raza has smashed 701 runs in 23 T20Is so far in 2022.
Others (continued): Five of Sikandar Raza's six T20I half-centuries have come in 2022.
Rohit Sharma scored a scratchy half-century against Netherlands, while KL Rahul struck 50 off 32 balls against Bangladesh.
Regis Chakabva has struggled in this T20: In seven innings at the World Cup, Regis Chakabva has scored only 45 runs at an average of 6.42 and a strike rate of 77.58.
